metadata.title: CVE-2019-20042 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In wp-includes/formatting.php in WordPress 3.7 to 5.3.0, the functionwp_targeted_link_rel() can be used in a particular way to result in astored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This has been patched inWordPress 5.3.1, along with all the previous WordPress versions from 3.7 to5.3 via a minor release.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
